recipe.title: Beet Salad
ingredients: 4 medium red or golden beets (4 ounces each), stems and root ends removed
instructions: Heat oven to 400°F. Wrap each beet in foil. Roast until soft, about 1 hour. Cool slightly; remove foil. Rub off skins; cut into wedges. Toss with nuts and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper. Add oil; toss. Divide among 4 plates; crumble cheese on top.
